heading: Today
text: Off and on snow showers for northern mountains, scattered, mixed with rain in valleys and south.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Snow showers north, and in the mountains. Clouds southeast.

heading: Thursday
text: Scattered to numerous snow showers, maybe mixing with valley rain.
temperature: Lower 30s to mid 40s, north to south

heading: Friday
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south
